string-array.name: warn_time
string-array.item: @string/warn_time_no_warning
3 Seconds
5 Seconds
7 Seconds
10 Seconds
15 Seconds

string-array.name: prepTTS
string-array.item: Get ready
Hope you\'ve warmed up
Are you ready for this?
Lets kick it
Lets go for your personal best
Time to kick ass and chew bubble gum… and I\'m all outta gum.
I will count to three. There will not be a four
I was born ready!
Well Hello Mister Fancypants
Yippee kai yay, muddy funster
When you\'ve got something to prove, there\'s nothing greater than a challenge
Age is no barrier. It’s a limitation you put on your mind
Without self-discipline, success is impossible
If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it
Make each day your masterpiece
You miss 100 percent of the shots you don’t take
It\'s not whether you get knocked down; it\'s whether you get up
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try
Push yourself. No one else will do it for you
Improvement begins at the end of your comfort zone
Look in the mirror. That’s your competition
Fear less. Do More. Get outside and get after it
Success trains. Failure complains
Don’t make excuses. Make results
Slow progress is still progress
ZombieLand Rule #18. Limber Up

string-array.name: workTTS
string-array.item: Time to kick ass and chew bubble gum… and I\'m all outta gum.
Do, or do not. There is no try
Gonna rip them a new one
Let\'s rock
What are you waiting for? Christmas?
I love the smell of sweat in the morning
It doesn\'t look like anything to me
It\'s clobberin\' time
Cocked, locked, and ready to rock
Time to go hard or go home
Get your arse in gear
Work until your lungs pop
Go… Go… Go
Don’t make excuses. Make results
Run Yasmin, run. Run like the wind
Muscles…Use them or lose them
Come on you pansy
Get back to it, you slacker!
Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they’ve got a second
Continuous effort, not strength or intelligence, is the key to unlocking potential
The difference between impossible and possible is determination
A trophy carries dust. Memories last forever
Never give up. Never give in
Persistence turns failure into achievement
Set your goals high, and don’t stop till you get there
Your greatest enemy lives between your own ears
Champions keep going until they get it right
If you fail to prepare, you’re prepared to fail
The road to Easy Street goes through the sewer
The more difficult the victory, the greater the achievement
Nobody regretted giving their best
Your biggest opponent isn’t the other guy. It’s human nature
Win If You Can, Lose If You Must, But NEVER QUIT!
Just keep going. Everybody gets better if they keep at it
Push yourself! Don’t give an inch until the final buzzer
Pain is temporary
It ain’t over till it’s over
You’re never a loser until you quit trying
You don’t always get what you wish for. You get what you work for
All things are difficult before they\'re easy
Sweat is Fat Crying
Better Sore Than Sorry
Exercise. Zombies will eat the slow ones first
ZombieLand Rule #1. Cardio
ZombieLand Rule #20. It’s a marathon, not a sprint. Unless it\'s a sprint. then sprint
You have a choice. You can throw in the towel, or you can use it to wipe the sweat off of your face
Some of the world\'s greatest feats were accomplished by people not smart enough to know they were impossible

string-array.name: restTTS
string-array.item: And rest
Get your breath back
Have a rest and then do it all again
Pain is temporary
Looks like cleanup on aisle four
Ooh, that\'s gotta hurt
Piece of Cake
Suck it down!
That\'s gonna leave a mark
I make this look good
Just a flesh wound
Tis but a scratch
That hurt you more than it hurt me
It’s not the will to win that matters, everyone has that. It’s the will to prepare to win that matters
The will to win is important, but the will to prepare is vital
Adversity cause some men to break; others to break records
Never give up! Failure is the first step to succeeding
Gold medals are made of sweat, determination and a hard to find alloy called guts
Sport doesn’t build character, it reveals it
Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you
Success is where preparation and opportunity meet
Remember that guy that gave up? Neither does anyone else
It’s a slow process. Quitting won’t speed it up
I may not be there yet, but I’m closer than I was yesterday
It never gets easier. You just get better
Falling down is how we grow. Staying down is how we die
Losers quit when they are tired. Winners quit when they’ve won
No matter how slow you go, you are still lapping everybody on the couch
The pain you feel today will be strength you feel tomorrow
Just do it. Then do it again
Sore. The most satisfying pain
Excuses burn zero calories
You are the creator of your own destiny
Your future self will thank you for today
Do a little more each day than you think you possibly can

string-array.name: doneTTS
string-array.item: And you\'re done
You\'re finished… well done
Congratulations. Time for a shower!
Those that did well, well done. Those that didn\'t… must try harder!
Welcome to Finish-Ville. Population: You
